_xResult.title: 'Piera' Luxe Custom Trousers
_xResult.longdesc:
Working with top London tailor & couturier Lino Piani is not like any experience you've had before. For one thing, he's an expert in dressing the female body with creations that flatter and fit. Second, he approaches every commission with creative consultation to help you get precisely the outcome you want. If you have envied the highly personalized experiences that men get when they buy a top quality custom suit, you'll be delighted to know you can have this same experience no matter where you live. Lastly, his attention to detail and the finest fabrics mean this is an investment you'll treasure for years to come.

 

These lovely wide leg pants are tailored in England from wool, which drapes beautifully and gets you through multiple seasons. Venetian-designed with front waistband and all-in-one centralized zipper. Design details we are dying for include the diagonally crossed flap pockets, high-back waistband, and buckled adjuster. These trousers come with crisp creases in the leg and with full lining. Make them uniquely yours.

 

  • Available in over 20 colors - see color card, write choice in checkout notes
  • Concealed hook and jigger button with zip fastening at front
  • 100% wool, Bemberg Cupro® lining
  • Dry clean only
